Title: Requires utilities to automatically enroll customers over the age of fifty-five in any available savings programs
Summary: Requires utilities to automatically enroll customers over the age of fifty-five in any available savings programs.
LawCode: Add ยง54, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring utilities to automatically enroll customers over the age of fifty-five in any available savings programs
